body_html:
1.5, 1.6 and nightlies are all built for CUDA 9.0
We discussed with NVIDIA, and after their recommendation we decided to stay with cuda 9.0 rather than 9.1, as 9.1 requires drivers that are not available in all distros.

body:
1.5, 1.6 and nightlies are all built for CUDA 9.0
We discussed with NVIDIA, and after their recommendation we decided to stay with cuda 9.0 rather than 9.1, as 9.1 requires drivers that are not available in all distros.
